20/* Id */
21
22#ifndef ISC_MAGIC_H
23#define ISC_MAGIC_H 1
24
25/*! \file isc/magic.h */
26
27typedef struct {
28 unsigned int magic;
29} isc__magic_t;
30
31
32/*%
33 * To use this macro the magic number MUST be the first thing in the
34 * structure, and MUST be of type "unsigned int".
35 * The intent of this is to allow magic numbers to be checked even though
36 * the object is otherwise opaque.
37 */
38#define ISC_MAGIC_VALID(a,b) (((a) != NULL) && \
39 (((const isc__magic_t *)(a))->magic == (b)))
40
41#define ISC_MAGIC(a, b, c, d) ((a) << 24 | (b) << 16 | (c) << 8 | (d))
42
43#endif /* ISC_MAGIC_H */
44
